content:
karisa Steffens is the Tech Section Editor of the lode PERIOD She transferred to Michigan Tech after receiving an Associates degree in accounting and an Associates degree in science from Southwestern Michigan College PERIOD Now she is pursuing a Bachelors degree in mathematics PERIOD In her free time Karisa enjoys reading and creative writing PERIOD She hopes to improve her writing and communication abilities by assisting the Lode in creating an informative and enthralling newspaper PERIOD

The Student News Site of Michigan Technological University
